Watson-Http
===========

Work with HTTP Request/Response objects, sessions, and more.

For full documentation please see `Read The
Docs <http://watson-http.readthedocs.org/>`__.

Build Status
^^^^^^^^^^^^

|Build Status| |Coverage Status| |Version|

Installation
------------

``pip install watson-http``

Dependencies
------------

-  watson-common
